そしてシリウスシュガーとカオスメイデンの公式戦当日――: And then, on the day of the official match between Sirius Sugaru and Chaos Maiden—
競技会場となるシティの市街地は、\nすごい数の見物客で溢れていた。:
The urban area of the city that served as the arena was...
It was overflowing with spectators.
へぇ、屋台まで出て、まるで祭りだな。: Wow, there's even a food stall. It's like a festival.
学園都市の住人にとってはお祭りみたいなものですわ。: To the residents of Academy City, it's like a festival.
市街地で行われるＭＧ競技は、学園都市の名物なんです！: The MG Games held in the city are a specialty of Academy City!
けど、こんな街中で戦って問題ないのか？建物が壊れたり、流れ弾が飛んだりしたら問題: But isn’t there a problem fighting in a city like this? It’d be a problem if a building broke down or a stray bullet went flying.
その辺は心配ご無用。建造物は学園予算で損害保証されてるし、武装も競技用だからね。: Don't worry about that. The school budget guarantees damage to the buildings, and the weapons are for competition.
街をあげてのお祭りってわけか。なるほどなぁ。: So this is a city-wide festival, huh? I see.
コレ目当ての観光客も多いからね。ほら、あそこ見なよ。: There's a lot of tourists out there looking for this. Look over there.
ラミが指した方を見ると、シリウスシュガーと\nカオスメイデンのオッズ表が大きく張:
I looked in the direction Rami was pointing and saw Sirius Sugaru
Chaos Maiden's odds are sticking out.
当然ですが、学園生徒は賭博禁止ですわよ？: It's only natural, but school students are forbidden from gambling, you know?
でもでも、バレなきゃ問題なくない？: But, but, as long as they don't find out, there shouldn't be a problem, right?
ま、一応オッズだけは確認しておくか。: Well, let's at least check the odds.
どれどれ……カオスメイデンの勝利が１．１倍。シリウスシュガーの勝利は……２２倍。: Let's see... Chaos Maiden's victory is 1.1 times greater. Sirius Sugar's... 22 times stronger. Isn't that overwhelming?
あはは。私達全然人気ないですね……: Ahaha. We're not popular at all...
それはそうだよ。端から見たら象とアリ。勝てる見込みなんて全然ないからね。: That's right. From the outside, it looks like an elephant and an ant. There's no hope of victory at all.
……でも、これで当てたら大金持ち。: ...But if I win this, I'll be rich.
そうだ、生徒の賭博が禁止なんでしょ？なら、生徒じゃない奴に頼めば……！: That’s right, students aren’t allowed to gamble, right? Then I’ll just ask someone who’s not a student...!
それもダメですわ！バレたらそっちの罪で退学ですわよ！？: You can't do that, either! If they find out, you'll be expelled for your crimes!
そうそう。バレないように、ノミ屋とか使わないと。: That's right. We'll have to use a flea shop or something to keep them from finding out.
まあ、何にしても今日ここに集る見物客のほとんどが、俺達の勝利なんか想像もしてない: Well, at any rate, most of the spectators gathered here today hadn't even imagined our victory.
誰もがカオスメイデンの勝利を信じて疑わない……そんな状況で、俺達が勝ったらどうな: No one would doubt Chaos Maiden’s victory... What do you think would happen if we won in a situation like that?
そうだ。今日はシリウスシュガーが最弱チームから、カオスメイデンを倒した伝説のチー: That's right. Today is the day Sirius Sugaru goes from the weakest team to the legendary team that defeated Chaos Maiden!
そうだ。さあ、気合を入れろ！: That's right. Now, get fired up!
お前たちの手で輝かしい未来を掴みとるんだ！: Grab a bright future with your hands!
ふふ、こういう状況で言ってみたかったんです。: Hehe, I wanted to say it in this situation.
だって、ある意味私達を結びつけた言葉ですから。: After all, in a way, they're the words that brought us together.
付随する思い出はえげつないものばっかだけどね。: The memories that come with it are all vulgar, though.
でも不思議と悪い気はしない。: But strangely, I don't feel bad about it.
情報によると、シリウスシュガーは模擬戦でカラフルブーケに勝利したそうです。: According to the information, Sirius Sugaru won the colorful bouquet in the mock battle.
ふふ、あのカラフルブーケに……なかなかやるじゃない。: Haha, that colorful bouquet... It's pretty good.
戦績から考えると、信じられないことです。これもあの指揮官の力によるものでしょうか: It's hard to believe, considering the results of the battle. I wonder if it's because of that commander's power.
この前会った時、ただ者じゃない感じはしてたもんね～！: The last time we met, I felt like you weren't just any ordinary person!
今回も何らかの奇策を用意しているに違いありません。皆さん、警戒は怠らないようにお: I'm sure they've come up with another plan. Everyone, please keep your guard up.
翠蘭ちゃんは心配性だね。どんな罠を仕掛けてこようと、食い破ればいいだけでしょ？: You're such a worrywart, Suiran-chan. No matter what kind of trap you set, all you have to do is eat through it, right?
ユリアさんの言う通りです。どんな小細工を弄しようと、ユリアさんの優位は揺らぎませ: Julia's right. No matter what tricks you use, Julia will always have the upper hand.
はい……ですが、彼は生徒会長が直々に任命したと聞いています。きっとなにか裏がある: Yes... However, I've heard that he was personally appointed by the Student Council President. I'm sure he has some ulterior motive.
生徒会長……それは手強そうね。: The Student Council President... That sounds tough.
ま、なにがあっても、私がなんとかするし、だいじょびっ！: Well, no matter what happens, I'll take care of it, so don't worry!
ええ、頼りにしていますよ。\nでは、行きましょう！:
Yes, I'll be counting on you.
Let's go, then!
長らくお待たせいたしました。まもなく、カオスメイデン対シリウスシュガーの試合を開: Sorry for the long wait. Chaos Maiden vs. Sirius Sugar will soon begin.
試合開始に際しまして、生徒会長の四王天神楽から改めて公式戦のルールを確認していた: At the start of the match, the student council president, Shiotenkagura, will reconfirm the rules of the official match!
本日の試合は５対５の殲滅戦。どちらのチームメンバー５名が撃墜されるまで決着はつき: Today's match is a five-on-five annihilation battle. We won't be able to settle this until five of our team members are shot down.
また今回はシリウスシュガー側に、生徒会から派遣した指揮官の%usernameus: Also, this time on the Sirius Sugar side, %usernameuserna%, the commander dispatched by the student council, is participating.
これはカオスメイデンとシリウスシュガーの実力差を鑑みた上での処置となります。: This is a measure taken in light of the difference in power between Chaos Maiden and Sirius Sugar.
なお、%usernameusernameuserna%機は武装を持たず、撃墜数の: %usernameusernameuserna% are not armed and are excluded from the count of shootings.
ですが、%usernameusernameuserna%機自体を狙うことは問題あ: However, there is no problem with targeting %user name, username, user name, %% machine itself. Shooting down the commander first before fighting is one of our tactics.
ルール説明は以上です。両チームとも、準備はよろしいですね？: That concludes the explanation of the rules. Are both teams ready?
それでは、カオスメイデン対シリウスシュガーの公式戦――開始！: Now then, the official battle between Chaos Maiden and Sirius Sugaru—begin!
